name: The Plagued Blade
description:
You are someone in a mysterious world where the ground is void and lifeless vessels idle nearby. Slash these vessels to reveal a mysterious portal to lead to the next area. Your blade is cursed so it's recommended to keep it away as much as possible. The less you hold it, the more health you'll have. This is my first game for a game jam and I hope you enjoy. Also don't mind my horrendous level designing skills.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Q to hold and put away the plagued blade

- Left click to attack (while holding plagued blade)

- Space to jump

- Escape to open pause menu

- Left shift to dash (while holding plagued blade)
